about_the_game:
The original KeeperRL soundtrack in "320kbps MP3's" format. 35 tracks and over 100 minutes of music. Includes fantasy tracks composed by Krzysztof Łoza as well as the classic piano pieces by Marcin Brzozowski.

Contains bonus tracks not present in the game!

All proceeds from this DLC are going to support the creators of the soundtrack.

Track list:

1. Intro (0:58)
2. Main Theme (2:54)
3. Battle Of The Keepers (2:30)
4. First Blood (1:41)
5. Blacodemon (3:42)
6. Rivers of Ellestia (3:49)
7. Night Neutral Ambience (2:56)
8. Myrthlands (4:48)
9. Blood Of Bartolomeus (3:10)
10. River Stream (2:13)
11. Dark Room (2:14)
12. Narrow Corridors (2:40)
13. Poison Trap (2:06)
14. Skirmish With The Vampire (2:26)
15. Grogrimbur's Hammer (3:20)
16. Road to Krispol (3:34)
17. Library (2:30)
18. Dungeon Necromancy (2:27)
19. Ancient Forest (2:45)
20. Battle For The Keep (3:12)
21. Keeper's Adventure (3:23)
22. Torture Room (3:12)
23. Imps (2:52)
24. The Dragon (4:08)
25. Caves of Valdea (2:09)
26. Meteor Shower (2:15)
27. Prelude From Azeros (2:39)
28. Bandits (2:10)
29. Shannaria (8:08)
30. Shannaria Revisited (2:50)
31. Irony Blade (3:10)
32. Dzieci z Jablorzewia (3:54)
33. Summon Spirits (4:11)
34. Keeper Plays Piano (1:48)
35. Outro (1:01)

name: KeeperRL Official Soundtrack
short_description: The original KeeperRL soundtrack composed by Krzysztof Łoza and Marcin Brzozowski. Includes bonus tracks!
